message: What are some features you would like to see in the showcase?
Paul can you be more specific
Paul and just to be clear I am referring to my side project poweredbyperch.com not grabaperch.com
I have a few ideas that I want to incorporate
I'd love to see advanced jQuery integration. Like a slideshow/sections slider, or tabbed area.
Indeed, sounds like a good idea
Right I have done all my stuff in ExpressionEngine and now I am going to migrate my super small sites to Perch
How Perch could be used for more dynamic areas of a site. This sort of thing http://is.gd/MJgzPE
I think the next step is I am going to redesign the showcase to make it more appealing
Once that is completed I plan on adding the ability to sort sites by add-ons
So if you want to see sites that are using the "twitter app" you can see just that.
Indeed. It's a great looking product, the simplicity of integration is a huge selling point
Right my favorite part is that you can retrofit previously developed sites.
have you launched any sites on perch?

Not yet, I've been researching CMS options for some upcoming projects. My front runners are Wordpress (+ Magic Fields Plugin) and Perch, depending on project requirements. Perch looks so, so good and so simple. Plus for a client the price is great.
Perch is very flexiable and has come a long way from when it was first introduced in 2009
